channel.title: Posts on Wei Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Wei Liu

item.title: Use of Rmarkdown: taking GFM package as an example
item.description: Introduction of Rmarkdown In this section, we briefly introduce some features of Rmarkdown.The Laguage of Rmarkdown is similar to that of Markdown, which is very easy to learn and write it. Creating Rmarkdown file in Rstudio Firstly, we create a new file in Rstudio, then choose the format of this file as ‘Rmd’(extension name). If we uncarefully save it as format ‘md’, then we can not run R code in each small chunk.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
